channel.title: What better way to celebrate a new mod....
channel.description:
....Then gathering another 15 mods and making a shrine to it?
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
GAMES: Half-Life Half-Life Blue Shift Half-Life Opposing Force Deathmatch Classic (as Half-Life Deathmatch) Half-Life 2 Half-Life 2 Episode 1 Half-Life 2 Episode 2 Half-Life 2 Lost Coast Half-Life 2 Deathmatch
MODS: Half-Life Decay (PC Port) Half-Life Azure Sheep Half-Life Invasion Half-Life Fate Reversal Half-Life Sven Half-Life Zombie Edition Half-Life Point of View Half-Life Destination Black Mesa Half-Life 2 Opposing Force 2 Half-Life 2 Capture The Flag Half-Life 2 Riot Act Synergy Half-Life 2 City 7: Toronto Conflict Half-Life 2 Research and Development Half-Life 2 Missing Infomation
Almost all icons are credit to [url='Vaksa']https://vaksa.deviantart.com/[/url]
